alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:21PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte and northeastern Lee Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 221 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Charleston Park to near Southwest Florida Airport. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Charleston Park, Olga, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Buckingham, Villas, Fort Myers Shores, Page Park, North Fort Myers, Page Field Airport, Alva, Suncoast Estates, Tice and Gateway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
